Credits to:
Mr. Boafist (Harm Groote) for helping me with the music ([url=https://www.facebook.com/BFLAVP/]Brothers for Life[/url])

And to my facebook group [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/SkyrimHunters/?fref=ts]Skyrim Hunters[/url]

[youtube]u_FQhTSV3bg[/youtube]

[/b]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]How to replace the menu music:[/size][/color][/b]

Download this file MANUALLY (choose only 1)
Unzip file
Go to your "DATA" folder
Go to the "Music" folder
make a new folder called "special"
Place the file in the "special" folder

Done

These are symphonique music productions produced by myself and mastered by Mr. Boafist ([url=https://www.facebook.com/BFLAVP/]Brothers for Life[/url])

[color=#00ffff][size=4]There are 2 music replacers:
[/size][/color]
Main file:

[youtube]YECDpeoPRRQ[/youtube]

Optional file:

[youtube]g6vA5cY3yc0[/youtube]

[color=#00ffff][size=3]NOTE: the first 25 seconds of the music on Youtube are an intro of my label and shall NOT be heard when you install one of the mods.[/size][/color]

Recommended mods:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76327/?]Bethesda logo replacer by [b]Ace Voyage[/b] [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76327/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76363/?]Menu replacer the Witch of Skyrim by [b]Ace Voyage[/b] [/url]
